Specimen Type: Citrated plasma and EDTA whole blood
Purpose: To assess inherited or acquired thrombophilia by measuring factors such as Protein C, Protein S, Antithrombin, Factor V Leiden, and Prothrombin G20210A.
Container: Blue-top sodium citrate tube for plasma; purple-top EDTA tube for whole blood
Equipment: Coagulation analyzer (e.g., Stago STA-R Max), centrifuge, micropipettes, timer, refrigerated storage
